name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Junior UK Edition
name_original: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Junior UK Edition
description:
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Junior UK Edition is a game developed by Hothouse Creations. It came out on 01-01-2001. It was published by Eidos Interactive.
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Junior UK Edition is available on PC.
